Игра конская залупа, блять с последними обновлениями - кал и кал, сплошной кал, особенно когда прогнулись под ЛГБТ.
Новые анимации? Хуйня из под коня, сперма бомжа нахуй. Старые гораздо лучше были. Все маны, которых понерфели - стали блять просто богами нахуй, особенно колокольчик. Колокола теперь хуй законтришь, уходит быстро в инвиз и выходит также. 
Блять, не советую эту игру покупать, лучше поиграйте в доту - тоже самое, но бесплатно.
如果你是看了什么主播来玩的话，我劝你连看的行为也立刻停止，不然当有一天你按耐不住要来体验这个游戏，你会被垃圾服务器，垃圾优化，垃圾队友和对手恶心的根本玩不下去。然后你要么选择气愤退坑，要么去恶心别人获得快感，陷入死循环，当然你真是这种人那确实可以玩玩，很适合你

В эту игру нужно, как минимум, наиграть пару сотни часов, чтобы в последующем не сраться от маньяков, а в частности от трап Хаги.

This game is honestly a dumpster fire. Lets all be honest, People who stream this game are either the most toxic people on the planet and get kicks off being toxic, or people who are stuck with this game and make content to put food on the table. God bless Otz BTW.

But back on topic, the game is horribly balanced and one sided cause the devs give zero fucks how the game truly is meant to function. The basis of the game is just, Killer hunt survivor hur hur. But its flipped on its head. Over the years, balance issues have been super one sided one dimensional. The meta in this game on the survivor end hasn't changed in 3-4 YEARS. But the killer meta has changed almost every time a new chapter comes out or mid-chapter update comes out. AKA once every 2-3 months or so. Now dont get me wrong, its good to have change. But only having one side of the spectrum changing is a VERY bad way to balance a game in my opinion.

My next issue... my god the anti-cheat. If you wanna spend your life running into cheated accounts at the start of the game with maxed killers/survivors with every perk to their name, then you got a lot of fun ahead of you. It is SUPER SUPER Easy to run into cheaters and to cheat. It's actually a circus. But the circus serves Jack Daniels and Mountain Dew. EAC is a joke.

My last issue I'll list here (trust me I could go on for hours but its 2 am) is the community. This games community, as expected, is toxic as all hell. I truly believe this game brings the worst out in humanity. Funny thing is that the killers arent the most toxic majority in this game (albeit they are super toxic), its actually the survivor mains. Which is a massive meme in the community. If you main survivor, you're likely the reason your parents divorced. Just sayin' mate.

Also MTX is rampant in this game like Evolve was if anyone remembers that.

Dont buy this game. Like actually, just dont.

面白いよねDead by Daylight
マジで面白いよDead by Daylight
あんな面白いゲーム他にないでしょ
うん、面白い Dead by Daylight
26体のキラーもいて、戦うたびに違うキラーと戦えて
面白いよねDead by Daylight
しかもホラー要素もあるし びっくり要素もある 面白いよね Dead by Daylight
板や窓枠の駆け引きもあるから面白いよね Dead by Daylight
キラーの能力もたくさんあって面白いよね Dead by Daylight
遠投ができるキラーだったりワープができるキラーだったりチェーンソーで突進できるキラーだったり相手を拘束できるキラーだったり檻で閉じ込めるキラーだったり結構面白いよね Dead by Daylight
しかもキラーやサバイバーごとに固有のパークとかもあるから面白いよね Dead by Daylight
例えばサバイバーだったら足が速くなったり、いいアイテム出るパークだったり、体を治すパークだったり、本当に面白いよね Dead by Daylight
マジで面白いよね Dead by Daylight
他にやるゲーム無いよね Dead by Daylight
あんなに面白いゲーム無いよね Dead by Daylight
ガチで面白いよね Dead by Daylight
マシューっていうディレクターいるんだけど、あいつも面白いよね、特に顔が面白いよね、あいつの眼鏡とか面白いよね、頭とかも面白いよねマシュー
マシューの発言とかも面白いよね
自分が作ったゲームなのにプレイヤーに対して I think we did a pretty good job so far (嫌なら別ゲーやれば？)って言っちゃうところもね面白いよね
そして自分が嫌なものは直ぐにナーフするのも面白いよね
例えば公式放送で懐中電灯でユーザーに煽られたから次の日に懐中電灯直ぐにナーフしようとするのも面白いよね
でも、バグでナーフしようと思った懐中電灯がね間違って強化しちゃうってところもね面白いよね
しかも強化内容が懐中電灯1フレーム照らしただけでキラーがスタンして全く前が見えなくなるバグっていうのも面白いよね
しかも20メートルくらい離れれても1フレーム当てただけで眩しくて何も出来なくなるのも面白いよね Dead by Daylight
本当にバグ多くて面白いよね Dead by Daylight
あんなに面白いゲーム他に無いよね Dead by Daylight
本当に Dead by Daylight 大好き

위선자가 판 치는 게임. 스트리머도 방송 안 하면 욕박고 비매너.
여자한테 착한척하고 평소엔 욕박는 발정난 새끼들 넘침.
친구들한텐 착한 모습 보이지만 아이디 바꿔서 상대해주면 쓰레기짓 하는 애들이 태반. 
핵쟁이 3할, 실력도 없이 욕만하는 쓰레기 3할, 위선자 3할로 10% 유저 빼면 다 쓰레기. 특히 스트리머들.

Muito bom. O Jogo tem uma gameplay fácil de aprender e difícil de dominar além de ter ótimas músicas. Da pra passar uma raiva de vez em quando quando tem killer retardado que campa gancho ou sobrevivente que faz 1 gerador por segundo, mas mesmo assim o jogo é super divertido, ainda mais com os amigos. Se você estiver procurando um jogo multiplayer com bastante gore, tensão e diversão esse é o jogo certo.

Behavior studios rewards players for playing in the worst ways possible and they literally don't care. Instead of making changes to make things more fair, they just say well that's how people play. They constantly prioritize cosmetics over fixing bugs. And the mmr system makes no sense. They even hid the ranks for a while so people wouldn't know how bad it was.

Okay a lot to explain about this game. Dead by Daylight is an interesting game to play. The game has been up and down but many ups and a lot of downs. The game is fun with friends and fun when you are bored. The game solo is just rough. The crossplay is just horrible to play with and against. Trying to play and not get disappointed in play is tough. I'm a rank 11 killer and rank 19 survivor (reset). I would play against rank 1,2,3 and 4 survivors on killer and it was just unfun and had to take a second to understand why. Then as survivor I would play against many high rank killers and just got stomped the whole game. The game is fun but it gets rough sometimes. When the highs happen they are great but when the lows happen they are low. Just my 2 cents

This review is coming from the perspective of a killer player, i play survivor with friends but that about it. Now then.

For killers, the queue times can take up to 10 minutes, killers like Pig can be extremly hard to get used to/get wins with and Survivors can be litteral cockroaches. But god damn is it fun to play. its just, good old fun i guess, killers like Ghostface, Plague, Oni, Myers, all these killers just, give this feeling of satisfaction when using them. if the game is on sale i recommend but at full price with its DLC can be super expensive.

A game that has grown and changed a lot but I consistently have played. Though I took a year break from the game and switched to pc the game is still super fun for me and I love growing in skill. Having a good match as killer or survivor is rewarding and with a large amount of characters and killers you can have plenty of fun games and make lots of different builds.
